Electromagnetic Workshop
========================

by [commpic](https://fke.utm.my/author/commpic/ "Posts by commpic")
 | Dec 7, 2016 | [COMM](https://fke.utm.my/category/comm/)

**SPEAKERS:**  
Assoc. Prof. Dr. Norazan Mohd Kassim  
Dr. Noor Asniza Murad

**DATE AND TIME:**  
6 February 2014 (Thursday) 9.00 am-5.00 pm

**VENUE:**  
P05 level 3, Faculty of Electrical Engineering, UTM

Brief description on event: This workshop was organized by Department of Communication Engineering with the objective to improve the performance quality of Electromagnetic Field Theory course among undergraduate students. The workshop was conducted by Head of Communication Engineering Department, Assoc. Prof. Dr. Norazan Mohd Kassim. During the workshop, Dr Norazan had given a talk on Electromagnetic Field Theory course syllabus as well as the best teaching method for this course. He also shared his experience teaching the course for almost 20 years. Beside Dr Norazan, Dr. Noor Asniza Murad as the course coordinator also gave talk on the EAC requirement for this course. The workshop also served as a medium for discussion among the lecturers who teaches Electromagnetic Field Theory.
